title.narrative: Agreement with IOM to Provide Financial Support the Women Empowerment, Life Skills Training Project in Region 7

description.narrative: The main objective is to promote economic resilience through empowerment and vocational training of FSW and vulnerable women at high risk of HIV including Venezuelan migrants and host community members. To achieve this one outcome and four outputs have been developed. The expected outcome is to improve livelihoods of the target population through the provision of empowerment sessions and life skills training. The outputs are: 1. Forty FSW and vulnerable women at risk of HIV including Venezuelan migrants and host community members, participated in empowerment sessions and life skills training. 2. Small Business handbook, easy to read materials, produced in Spanish and English to guide participants in setting up their small business. 3. Forty participants sensitized about HIV and STIs, know their HIV status and are linked to Care and Treatment services if tested positive for HIV. 4. Forty FSW and vulnerable women at risk of HIV are certified in vocational - Cosmetology training in the areas of hair, braid and extension, nails and facial. The main activities are as follows: 1.1 Community mobilization for identifying participants. 1.2 Vocational training in Cosmetology course. 1.3 Small business management empowerment sessions. 2.1 Produce small business handbook guide. 3.1 Healthy lifestyle sessions.

participating-org.narrative: JOINT UNITED NATIONS PROGRAMME ON HIV AND AIDS
